basic.description: A study of representative literary works in the Middle Ages, including La Chanson de Roland, Tristan et Iseult, Le Roman de Renart, Le Roman de la Rose, Chrétien de Troyes, Rutebeuf and Villon. Travaux pratiques include essays and tests. Given jointly with FREN 404/3.0.
basic.subject: FREN
basic.title: Introduction à la littérature française du Moyen Age

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites    FREN221 or (FREN212 and FREN220).
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from FREN304; FREN404.
